Verses: 1 boomiyum Adhin Niraivum, Ulagamum Adhilulla Kudigalum Karththarudaiyadhu.
2 avare Adhaik Kadalgalukku Melaaga Asthibaarappaduththi, Adhai Nadhigalukku Melaaga Sthaabiththaar.
3 yaar Karththarudaiya Parvadhaththil Eruvaan? Yaar Avarudaiya Parisuththa Sthalaththil Nilaiththiruppaan?
4 kaigalil Suththamullavanum Irudhayaththil Maasillaadhavanumaayirundhu, Than Aaththumaavai Maayaikku Oppukkodaamalum, Kabadaai Aanaiyidaamalum Irukkiravane.
5 avan Karththaraal Aaseervaadhaththaiyum, Than Ratchippin Dhevanaal Needhiyaiyum Peruvaan.
6 idhuve Avaraith Thedi Visaariththu, Avarudaiya Samugaththai Naadugira Yaakkobu Ennum Sandhadhi. (selaa.)
7 vaasalgale, Ungal Thalaigalai Uyarththungal; Anaadhi Kadhavugale, Uyarungal; Magimaiyin Raajaa Utpiravesippaar.
8 yaar Indha Magimaiyin Raajaa? Avar Vallamaiyum Baraakkiramumulla Karththar; Avar Yuththaththil Baraakkiramumulla Karththaraame.
9 vaasalgale, Ungal Thalaigalai Uyarththungal; Anaadhi Kadhavugale, Uyarungal; Magimaiyin Raajaa Utpiravesippaar.
10 yaar Indha Magimaiyin Raajaa? Avar Senaigalin Karththaraanavar; Avare Magimaiyin Raajaa. (selaa.)
